state.name: grayed
state.description: When tree checkbox is grayed

element.name: Tree-Indent
element.description: The area freed by indenting an item for one level.

property.name: width
property.description: The indention-width of one level. This property can not be influenced by the states of the element.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the indention. It is centered within the available area, defined by the "width"-property and the height of the item. The overflow is not visible.

style.name: RIGHT_TO_LEFT
style.description: Indicates that the tree is oriented right to left.

state.name: line
state.description: Indicates that the level continues after this item. Never used for the final level and therefore never combined with the other states.

state.name: first
state.description: Used for the final level if the item has no previous sibling.

state.name: last
state.description: Used for the final level if the item has no next sibling.

state.name: collapsed
state.description: Used for the final level if the item has children.

state.name: expanded
state.description: Used for the final level if the item is expanded

state.name: hover
state.description: Mouse over state. Can not be used together with line.
